articles.author: Barbara Starr, CNN Pentagon Correspondent
articles.title: Taliban members escorted Americans to gates at Kabul airport in secret arrangement with US - CNN
articles.description: The US military negotiated a secret arrangement with the Taliban that resulted in members of the militant group escorting clusters of Americans to the gates of the Kabul airport as they sought to escape Afghanistan, two defense officials told CNN.

articles.title: U.S. rail regulator rejects CN's voting trust bid to buy Kansas City Southern - CBC.ca

articles.title: Senate passes bill to provide assistance to Americans returning from Afghanistan - CNN

articles.title: Level 3, not Level 4: U.S. mistakenly tells Americans ‘do not travel’ to Canada - Global News
articles.description: For the first time in 16 months, Canada reopened its land borders for fully vaccinated Americans on Aug. 9, but the U.S. has yet to reciprocate.
articles.content:

articles.title: NASA Prompts Companies for Artemis Lunar Terrain Vehicle Solutions - NASA
articles.description: NASA is asking American companies for additional input on approaches and solutions for a vehicle to transport Artemis astronauts around the lunar South Pole later this decade.
